scripts.e2e: npm run e2e:compile && gherkin-testcafe chrome features/*.feature dist/**/*.steps.js -r json:dist/e2e/test-results.json -e --hostname localhost; echo 'Done'
scripts.e2e:debug: npm run e2e:compile && gherkin-testcafe chrome **/*.feature dist/**/*.steps.js -e --hostname localhost -d
scripts.e2e:headless: npm run e2e:compile && gherkin-testcafe 'chrome:headless' features/*.feature dist/**/*.steps.js -r json:dist/e2e/test-results.json -e --hostname localhost; echo 'Done'
scripts.e2e:headless:dev: npm run e2e:compile && gherkin-testcafe 'chrome:headless' e2e/**/*.feature dist/**/*.steps.js -e --screenshots-on-fails
scripts.e2e:only: npm run e2e:compile && gherkin-testcafe chrome **/*.feature dist/**/*.steps.js -e --hostname localhost --tags @only -L
scripts.e2e:only:debug: npm run e2e:compile && gherkin-testcafe chrome **/*.feature dist/**/*.steps.js -e --hostname localhost --tags @only -d
scripts.e2e:only:video: npm run e2e:compile && gherkin-testcafe chrome **/*.feature dist/**/*.steps.js -e --hostname localhost --tags @only --video videos --video-options singleFile=true,failedOnly=false
